Mandelbrot Set

25 Aug 2014

This is the first program I wrote with Processing. It can draw Mandelbrot set in a simple way. You can press the mouse button to zoom in or out, and change the speed with your keyboard. Mandelbrot set is the set of â€™s which its related series

converges in the complex plane. The black section in the picture is the Mandelbrot set.

Environment: Processing 2.1
